actions.text: On agreeing to the Spence amendments (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendments en bloc consist of the text of amendments numbered 1, 2, 3, 5, 6, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12 (as modified), 15, 18, 21, 22, 23, 24, 25, 26 (as modified), 27, 29, 30, and 33 printed on pages H5027-H5030 in the Congressional Record for May 14, 1996.
purpose: An amendment, consisting of the following amendments printed in House Report part B of House Report 104-570: Amendment Nos. 1, 2, 3, 5, 6, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12 (as modified), 15, 18, 21, 22, 23, 24, 25, 26 (as modified), 27, 29, 30, and 33.
